item.title: Load pubkey "/root/.ssh/key.pem": invalid format
item.author: hieuletrung102@gmail.com (Hieu Le)
item.description: Last week, i tackled a task that required to ssh to remote server from a cron job. Identity is authenticated using PEM file. I can connect successfully from my local terminal with command. $ ssh -i ~/.ssh/key.pem root@host My PEM file format is as such -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- [actual key] -----END RSA PRIVATE KEY----- The problem happened when cron job (running within a docker container) try to ssh, there is Load pubkey “/root/.
